import React from 'react' import { popular } from '../../../../dummyData' import Heading from '../../../common/heading/Heading' import Slider from "react-slick"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick.css"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css"; const Popular = () => { const settings = { className: "center", centerMode: false, infinite: true, centerPadding: "", slidesToShow: 2, speed: 500, rows: 4, slidesPerRow: 1, dots: false, responsive: [ { breakpoint: 800, settings: { slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, } }, ] }; return ( <>
{popular.map((val) => { return (
{val.catgeory}

{val.title.slice(0, 40)}...

) })}
) } export default Popular
